headline: Assessing Gen Digital (GEN) Valuation After Recent Share Price Volatility
summary: What Gen Digital’s Recent Share Performance Tells You Gen Digital (GEN) has been drawing attention after a recent one day share price decline of about 4.5%, extending a weaker patch over the past month and past 3 months. See our latest analysis for Gen Digital. Zooming out, the recent 4.5% one day share price decline to $23.55 sits within a wider phase of fading momentum. The 30 day share price return is 10.39% and the year to date share price return is 9.67%, while the 1 year total...
